Welcome to Yelp_reviews’s documentation!¶

This documentation is about yelp dataset. Yelp dataset consists of reviews for different businesses sorted by many attributes. You can download it from here. After downloading, you have to extract it twice to get the original dataset consisting of five json files.

Here, you will be going through the following steps:

  1. performing sentiment analysis on yelp reviews dataset.

  2. plotting the reviews according to city and business using plotly.

  3. performing contextual analysis and plotting the comments as wordcloud.

Contents:

  • Performing sentiment analysis
    • All together
  • Plotting the output
  • Performing contextual analysis
